lead_paragraph: Rio Ferdinand is confident Paul Pogba will cope with the pressure of his world record transfer fee after completing his move to Manchester United on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Soccer: Ferdinand Backs Pogba to Handle Record Transfer Fee
headline.main: Soccer: Ferdinand Backs Pogba to Handle Record Transfer Fee

snippet: Rio Ferdinand is confident Paul Pogba will cope with the pressure of his world record transfer fee after completing his move to Manchester United on Tuesday....
